member.name: T:BuberDinner.Domain.Common.Models.ValueObject
member.summary: Base class for value objects, which are immutable and compared by their properties.
member.remarks: Value objects are used to represent concepts that do not have a distinct identity, such as a date range or a monetary amount. They are compared based on their property values rather than by reference.
